name: Misumi Brightening Facial Cleanser
description: Misumi perfect radiance brightening facial cleanser gently cleanses impurities, purifies and brightens for a healthier, refreshed and radiant complexion. Formulated with scientifically proven naturally skin brightening mulberry extract and claire blanche TM, an advanced Japanese skin brightening complex infused with multi-functional scutellaria root, tree peony and strawberry geranium extracts, this soft facial cleanser effectively reduces skin dullness caused by pollution, and boosts skin’s luminescence for a beautifully perfect radiance. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
